title: Lower non-throwing cancellation points to cancelled status outcomes without false success
feature: cancellation propagation and task-context lowering invariants

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: non-throwing wait and join cancellation points lower to explicit cancelled status results rather than success
cancelled status lowering does not report a successful payload for a cancelled completion
task-context cancellation state drives wait outcome mapping without injecting asynchronous exceptions
runtime_assertions: can07_nonthrowing_wait_reports_cancelled returns 1 when cancellation is requested before wait completion
function returns -1 if a cancelled wait reports success or returns a non-nil payload

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized lowering preserves non-throwing cancelled status semantics for wait and join primitives
optimization does not fold cancelled-status outcomes into success paths
task-context cancellation to status mapping remains equivalent to -O0
runtime_assertions: optimized lowering still rejects false-success cancellation outcomes

abi_field_stability.required_shape: non-throwing wait primitives map cancelled task context state to cancelled status instead of success
cancelled status results do not reuse success payload interpretation
